Please identify the "Chemical" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Chemical". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Testosterone ( 1 mg . kg ( - 1 ) . d ( - 1 ) , sc ) , the androgen receptor antagonist flutamide ( 10 mg . kg ( - 1 ) . d ( - 1 ) , ip ) , the estrogen receptor antagonist tamoxifen ( 1 mg . kg ( - 1 ) . d ( - 1 ) , ip ) or the aromatase inhibitor letrozole ( 4 mg . kg ( - 1 ) . d ( - 1 ) , ip ) were administered for 6 d after the first injection of STZ .

| --- |

| Flutamide |
| Tamoxifen |

Note:

* "STZ" is not a chemical entity, but rather an abbreviation for "streptozotocin", which is a chemical compound.
* "ip" and "sc" are not chemical entities, but rather abbreviations for "intraperitoneal" and "subcutaneous", which are routes of administration.
